comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Probably Herbert E. Ives (1882-1953), scientist and engineer. If so, his Wikipedia article could use this photo.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: whyaduck: Thanks for the tip! This does appear to be Herbert E. Ives, based on another image of a slightly older Ives in our collections, which is found within the Prints & Photographs Online Catalog and can be seen here.
